- Controls -

Move Left : A

Move Right : D

Jump : Space Button

Attack : J or Left Mouse Button

Dash : K or Shift

Shoot : L or Right Mouse Button

Menu: Esc or Backspace

- Saving -

The save file you create remains as long as you don't clear your browsers cache, so reload and close the page as many times as you want!

- About -

Blade of Yama is a short metroidvania inspired game made for a final school project. In the world of Brankarr you play as Yama, wielding a giant sword and a small crossbow mounted on the arm. Swing and shoot your way through a world made with influences of the retro NES console games and defeat the evil that has appeared before you. 

- Speedrun -

If interested in submitting a speedrun time, write a comment and we will be in touch!

- Feedback -

Writing a comment after playing the game and telling how the game played out would be much appreciated. We know there are some bugs here and there but with the time strain we had working on it, this is the best we could do. Hope you enjoyed it!
